description: '''4hero''' (sometimes referred to as '''4 Hero''' or '''4-Hero''') are an [[electronic music]] group from [[Dollis Hill]], London, comprising producers Mark "Marc Mac" Clair & Denis "Dego" McFarlane. 4hero are known for being pioneers of [[breakbeat hardcore]], [[Jungle music|jungle]]/[[drum and bass]], [[broken beat]] and [[nu jazz]] music.
